titlestmt.titleproper: Stanford University, Center on Democracy, Development, and the Rule of Law, Honors Theses

repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

did.unittitle: Stanford University, Center on Democracy, Development, and the Rule of Law, Honors Theses
did.physloc: Special Collections and University Archives materials are stored offsite and must be paged 36-48 hours in advance. For more information on paging collections, see the department's website: http://library.stanford.edu/spc.
Special Collections and University Archives materials are stored offsite and must be paged at least 36 hours in advance.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: While Special Collections is the owner of the physical and digital items, permission to examine collection materials is not an authorization to publish. These materials are made available for use in research, teaching, and private study. Any transmission or reproduction beyond that allowed by fair use requires permission from the owners of rights, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/spc/using-collections/permission-publish

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [identification of item], Stanford University, Center on Democracy, Development, and the Rule of Law, Honors Theses (SC4-6539). Department of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of honors theses written by undergraduates in the Center on Democracy, Development, and the Rule of Law program.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research; materials must be requested at least 48 hours in advance of intended use. No photocopies may be made.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright is retained by the creator for materials they have authored or otherwise produced. Transmission or reproduction of materials requires the written permission of the copyright owner.
